item.description:
We will touch base on jazz, contemporary and tap. After December we will decide what styles of dance you would like to study further and increase our time with each style.

Please wear comfortable clothes and sneakers (dance shoes are not required but feel free to wear them if you have them)

The hour and fifteen minute long class is $10 or you can buy a studio ten-pack for $90 (you can also use this for zumba, trim&tone, hip hop, pilates, bootcamp, pilates and strip fit)

You must register for the class at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com at least 24 hours before the class runs to hold your spot (classes have a minimum requirement)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Dance
